briefdescription.para: PWM_TIMER Device Work Mode Types Enum.
PWM_TIMER interrupt handler or Interrupt Service Routine(ISR)
interrupt handler for each pwm_timer channel
PWM_TIMER Device Work Mode Types Enum.

detaileddescription.para: informations about pwm_timer open count, working status, pwm_timer registers and ctrl structure

Define pwm_timer device interface, like pwm_timer information structure, provide functions to open/close/control pwm_timer, send/receive data by pwm_timer
All this details are implemented by user in user porting code

briefdescription.para: get an pwm_timer device by pwm_timer device id.

detaileddescription.para:
For how to use pwm_timer device hal refer to \ref dev_pwm_timer "Functions in pwm_timer device structure"
pwm_timer_id
id of pwm_timer, defined by user
!NULL
pointer to an pwm_timer device structure
NULL
failed to find the pwm_timer device by pwm_timer_id
need to implemented by user in user code get an pwm_timer device by pwm_timer device id.

Provide common definitions for pwm_timer device, then software developer can develop pwm_timer driver following this definitions, and the applications can directly call this definition to realize functions
